wordGroup: straight shooter 坦白正直的人

sentences.en: When the shooter aimed at the dove, the dove dived into the bushes.
sentences.cn: 当射手瞄准那只鸽子时，它潜进了丛林。

sentences.en: An eyewitness identified him as the shooter.
sentences.cn: 一位目击者指证他就是那个枪手。

sentences.en: The unusual angle of this wound points to the second shooter from a higher level.
sentences.cn: 这个伤口的不同寻常的角度显示，第二枪从更高的地方发射。
